QuestData.Title: A Big Horkin' Task
QuestData.Description:
<Glimmergut begins to draw in the sand.
The murloc traces the outline of what appears to be a large seal. He points at the picture, then upwards, indicating that the creature must be somewhere on the surface of the water.
The murloc then digs a small, shallow hole in the sand, and points at it several times.>
Mrg! Mrg! Grml.
<He cocks his head expectantly.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect one Pile of Blubberfat and deliver it to Glimmergut in Venture Bay.
